message.body: Lawyer called Steph today.. doesn't look like I'm getting anything. Walk away with a few thousand and that its.
Steph is getting a lot tho bec she is injured with permanent damage. I have no permanent injuries

If i had permanent damage I would be getting more money so I guess its a good thing I'm not seriously injured. But the amount I'm getting after lawyer fees and medical bills isn't going to pay for much.
I always thougu the passages get more

I'm not sure yet... and it depends. Like I'm covered by the hitters insurance geico and his coverage is only like 10-30. Meaning 10 thous minimum to 30 thous maximum. Whereas stephs insurance is progressI've and her coverage is 50 to 100. So she can get 50 thous to 100 thous
If I was on her policy at the time of the accident ib think I would be covered by her 50-100... but the guys insurance coverage is crap
